Ghost promotions are here… and they’re exactly as bad as they sound. You get a shiny new title, more responsibility, more micromanagement — and mysteriously, no raise, no announcement, and no actual authority. Let’s break down this latest corporate buzzword, why companies do it, and how “career growth” has officially become a ghost story.
title: GHOST PROMOTIONS ARE HERE!
